item.description:
I know it's kind of last minute and this is scheduled rather early in the evening, but it's part of the Wesport River Vineyards' Summer Sunset Music series.  Blues Train is a local 4 piece band known to keep your feet moving with some good Rock, Blues & Funk!

Join us at the picturesque Westport River Vineyards for some good music, great wine and and better friends.  It only cost $10 per carload so carpool up in the car/van. Get there as early as you can so we can be together.

The series runs through Friday September 7th. From 6pm to 8pm the winery will feature live entertainment as the sun sets over the beautiful vineyard. It's a picnic style event, so either pack in your own food or buy some dinner from Wayne Gibson's South Coast Local (who will be serving up a variety of BBQ, from pulled pork sandwiches to hot dogs for the kids). Don't forget a blanket, chairs, bug spray, glasses or a cork screw.Admission is $10 per carload and beer, wine and SoCo Local food will be served for a fee. The event is weather permitting and NO OUTSIDE ALCOHOL is permitted. They will be selling wine by the glass or by the bottle.  They won't be having wine tastings.

Here's the Vineyard's link for the event;http://www.westportrivers.com/events.html.

This event is being cross posted with Boston Providence Single Parents and South Shore Hike, Bike and Social Club.

This should be a fun night out, hope you can join us!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll message attendees the day before with info
item.name: Blues Train at Westport River Vineyards
